section.heading: Uses of Resident Welfare Fund.
section.text: The Fund shall be used for the following purposes, in order of priority:

para.text: To stock the commissaries of District correctional facilitiesand
To provide goods and services that benefit the general resident population at District correctional facilities, as determined by the Resident Welfare Fund Committee established in § 24-284.
